mapper.sql: select column_id, table_id, column_name, column_comment, column_type, java_type, java_field, is_pk, is_increment, is_required, is_insert, is_edit, is_list, is_query, query_type, html_type, dict_type, sort, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from gen_table_column
mapper.select: select T1.COLUMN_NAME AS column_name, T1.COLUMN_ID AS sort , CONCAT(lower(T1.DATA_TYPE), '(', T1.DATA_LENGTH, ')') AS column_type, T2.COMMENTS AS column_comment, (CASE WHEN T3.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) AS is_pk , (CASE WHEN T1.NULLABLE = 'N' THEN '1' ELSE NULL END) AS is_required, '0' AS is_increment from DBA_TAB_COLUMNS T1 LEFT JOIN DBA_COL_COMMENTS T2 ON T1.OWNER = T2.OWNER AND T1.TABLE_NAME =T2.TABLE_NAME AND T1.COLUMN_NAME=T2.COLUMN_NAME LEFT JOIN ( select T1.*, T2.CONSTRAINT_TYPE from DBA_CONS_COLUMNS T1 LEFT JOIN DBA_CONSTRAINTS T2 ON T1.CONSTRAINT_NAME = T2.CONSTRAINT_NAME ) T3 ON T1.OWNER = T3.OWNER AND T1.TABLE_NAME =T3.TABLE_NAME AND T1.COLUMN_NAME=T3.COLUMN_NAME where T1.OWNER = SF_GET_SCHEMA_NAME_BY_ID(CURRENT_SCHID()) AND T1.TABLE_NAME= (#{tableName}) ORDER BY T1.COLUMN_ID

SELECT T1.COLUMN_NAME AS column_name, T1.COLUMN_ID AS sort, CONCAT( LOWER( T1.DATA_TYPE ), '(', T1.DATA_LENGTH, ')' ) AS column_type, T2.COMMENTS AS column_comment, ( CASE WHEN T1.NULLABLE = 'N' THEN '1' ELSE NULL END ) AS is_required, '0' AS is_increment, (CASE WHEN T3.CONTYPE = 'p' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) AS is_pk FROM ALL_TAB_COLS T1 LEFT JOIN all_col_comments T2 ON T1.TABLE_NAME = T2.TABLE_NAME AND T1.COLUMN_NAME = T2.COLUMN_NAME LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T1.TABLE_NAME, T1.COLUMN_NAME, T2.CONTYPE FROM all_cons_columns T1 LEFT JOIN sys_constraint T2 ON T1.CONSTRAINT_NAME = T2.CONNAME ) T3 ON T1.TABLE_NAME = T3.TABLE_NAME AND T1.COLUMN_NAME = T3.COLUMN_NAME WHERE T1.TABLE_NAME = (#{tableName}) ORDER BY T1.COLUMN_ID
